text: Kare (dāūdo) wa,`kare ga anata no hitsuji o, torikomou to shita no wa, tashika ni futōdesu. Hontōni kyōdō de shigoto o suru mono no ōku wa, tagaini okashi au. Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa betsudaga, sore wa maredesu.' To itta. (Sonotoki) dāūdo wa, ware ga kare o kokoromita koto o Yuiri,-nushi no o yurushi o koi, reihai ni hirefushi, kaigo shite omo no omoto ni kaetta. 〔Sajida〕
